20110112040240.000|20110112040242.000|CC1|BUT IN OUR FIFTH STORY, THEY    
20110112040242.000|20110112040244.000|CC1|HAVE BEEN SUPPLANTED BY TOO FAR 
20110112040244.000|20110112040246.000|CC1|MORE GRIM WORDS ABOUT THE       
20110112040246.000|20110112040250.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN BY THE MAN CHARGED
20110112040250.000|20110112040252.000|CC1|WITH SHOOTING HER.              
20110112040252.000|20110112040252.000|CC1|PIMA COUNTY SHERIFF'S CHIEF RICK
20110112040252.000|20110112040254.000|CC1|CASTIGAR TOLD THE PRESS THIS    
20110112040254.000|20110112040255.000|CC1|MORNING THAT A FOURTH NOTE HAD  
20110112040255.000|20110112040257.000|CC1|BEEN FOUND IN JARED LOUGHNER'S  
20110112040257.000|20110112040258.000|CC1|HOME, BESIDES THE ONES THAT     
20110112040258.000|20110112040300.000|CC1|READ, "I PLANNED AHEAD," "MY    
20110112040300.000|20110112040301.000|CC1|ASSASSINATION," AND JUST        
20110112040301.000|20110112040304.000|CC1|"GIFFORDS."                     
20110112040304.000|20110112040307.000|CC1|THE FOURTH ONE SIMPLY READ, "DIE
20110112040307.000|20110112040309.000|CC1|BITCH."                         
20110112040309.000|20110112040311.000|CC1|CLARENCE DUPNIK ALSO REVEALED   
20110112040311.000|20110112040312.000|CC1|THAT ON THE MORNING OF THE      
20110112040312.000|20110112040313.000|CC1|ATTACK, LOUGHNER'S FATHER SAW   
20110112040313.000|20110112040314.000|CC1|HIM TAKE A BLACK BAG OUT OF A   
20110112040314.000|20110112040315.000|CC1|CAR TRUNK.                      
20110112040315.000|20110112040317.000|CC1|WHEN THE ELDER LOUGHNER TRIED TO
20110112040317.000|20110112040318.000|CC1|CONFRONT HIS SON, LOUGHNER      
20110112040318.000|20110112040319.000|CC1|MUMBLED SOMETHING AND BEGAN TO  
20110112040319.000|20110112040321.000|CC1|RUN.                            
20110112040321.000|20110112040322.000|CC1|THE ELDER LOUGHNER GOT INTO HIS 
20110112040322.000|20110112040324.000|CC1|TRUCK AND CHASED HIS SON INTO   
20110112040324.000|20110112040326.000|CC1|THE DESERT.                     
20110112040326.000|20110112040327.000|CC1|HE OBVIOUSLY DID NOT STOP HIM.  
20110112040327.000|20110112040329.000|CC1|WITHIN HOURS, INVESTIGATORS ALSO
20110112040329.000|20110112040330.000|CC1|SAY LOUGHNER EMPTIED 31 SHELLS, 
20110112040330.000|20110112040334.000|CC1|THAT'S HOW MANY WERE RECOVERED  
20110112040334.000|20110112040336.000|CC1|FROM THE SCENE OF SATURDAY'S    
20110112040336.000|20110112040336.000|CC1|SHOOTING.                       
20110112040336.000|20110112040337.000|CC1|LOUGHNER EXPENDED THE 31        
20110112040337.000|20110112040338.000|CC1|MAGAZINE PLUS ONE IN THE GUN'S  
20110112040338.000|20110112040340.000|CC1|CHAMBER, AND INVESTIGATORS SAY  
20110112040340.000|20110112040342.000|CC1|AT LEAST 20 BULLETS STRUCK      
20110112040342.000|20110112040343.000|CC1|PEOPLE PRESENT AT THE SCENE, OF 
20110112040343.000|20110112040344.000|CC1|COURSE, KILLING 6 AND WOUNDING  
20110112040344.000|20110112040346.000|CC1|14 MORE.                        
20110112040346.000|20110112040355.000|CC1|BACK TO THE GOOD NEWS.          
20110112040355.000|20110112040355.000|CC1|ONE OF THE CONGRESSWOMAN'S      
20110112040355.000|20110112040356.000|CC1|REPUBLICAN COLLEAGUES PROPOSALS 
20110112040356.000|20110112040357.000|CC1|GUN CONTROL LEGISLATION AIMED   
20110112040357.000|20110112040358.000|CC1|SPECIFICALLY TO PROTECT ELECTED 
20110112040358.000|20110112040359.000|CC1|OFFICIALS.                      
20110112040359.000|20110112040401.000|CC1|AND ONE OF THEIR DEMOCRATIC     
20110112040401.000|20110112040403.000|CC1|COLLEAGUES JOINS ME TO PROPOSE  
20110112040403.000|20110112040403.000|CC1|SOMETHING STRONGER STILL,       
20110112040403.000|20110112040404.000|CC1|PERHAPS.                        
20110112040404.000|20110112040406.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GIFFORDS IS STILL 
20110112040406.000|20110112040407.000|CC1|IN CRITICAL CONDITION, BUT HER  
20110112040407.000|20110112040410.000|CC1|NEUROSURGEON, THE DR. MICHAEL   
20110112040410.000|20110112040412.000|CC1|LEMOLE, DESCRIBED THE NEW AND   
20110112040412.000|20110112040413.000|CC1|CLEARLY POSITIVE DEVELOPMENTS.  
20110112040413.000|20110112040414.000|CC1|>> WE'VE BEEN ABLE TO BACK OFF  
20110112040414.000|20110112040416.000|CC1|ON SOME OF THAT SEDATION.       
20110112040416.000|20110112040417.000|CC1|AND IN FACT, SHE'S ABLE TO      
20110112040417.000|20110112040418.000|CC1|GENERATE HER OWN BREATHS.       
20110112040418.000|20110112040419.000|CC1|SHE'S BREATHING ON HER OWN.     
20110112040419.000|20110112040422.000|CC1|IN FACT, THE ONLY REASON WE KEEP
20110112040422.000|20110112040423.000|CC1|THAT BREATHING TUBE IN IS TO    
20110112040423.000|20110112040425.000|CC1|PROTECT HER AIRWAY, SO THAT SHE 
20110112040425.000|20110112040426.000|CC1|DOESN'T HAVE COMPLICATIONS LIKE 
20110112040426.000|20110112040427.000|CC1|PNEUMONIA.                      
20110112040427.000|20110112040430.000|CC1|SHE'S GOING TO TAKE HER RECOVERY
20110112040430.000|20110112040431.000|CC1|AT HER OWN PACE.                
20110112040431.000|20110112040431.000|CC1|AND I'M VERY ENCOURAGED BY FACT 
20110112040431.000|20110112040433.000|CC1|THAT SHE HAS DONE SO WELL.      
20110112040433.000|20110112040435.000|CC1|THIS KIND OF INJURY, I THINK    
20110112040435.000|20110112040436.000|CC1|WE'VE SAID IT A COUPLE OF TIMES,
20110112040436.000|20110112040437.000|CC1|A PENETRATING INJURY THROUGH THE
20110112040437.000|20110112040439.000|CC1|SKULL, REALLY, THE SURVIVAL, LET
20110112040439.000|20110112040441.000|CC1|ALONE RECOVERY, IS ABYSMAL.     
20110112040441.000|20110112040442.000|CC1|SHE HAS NO RIGHT TO LOOK THIS   
20110112040442.000|20110112040443.000|CC1|THE GOOD AND SHE DOES.          
20110112040443.000|20110112040445.000|CC1|WE'RE HOPEFUL.                  
20110112040445.000|20110112040447.000|CC1|>> THERE IS, THUS FAR, NO REPORT
20110112040447.000|20110112040449.000|CC1|TODAY OF ANY INCREASE OF        
20110112040449.000|20110112040450.000|CC1|SWELLING IN THE CONGRESSWOMAN'S 
20110112040450.000|20110112040451.000|CC1|BRAIN.                          
20110112040451.000|20110112040453.000|CC1|THREE OTHER VICTIMS REMAIN IN   
20110112040453.000|20110112040455.000|CC1|SERIOUS CONDITION AND TWO MORE  
20110112040455.000|20110112040457.000|CC1|ARE IN FAIR CONDITION.          
20110112040457.000|20110112041642.000|SEG|Type=Story
20110112040457.000|20110112040458.000|CC1|>>> MY FIRST GUEST,             
20110112040458.000|20110112040459.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN CAROLYN McCARTHY, 
20110112040459.000|20110112040501.000|CC1|WILL SOON INTRODUCE LEGISLATION,
20110112040501.000|20110112040502.000|CC1|ALONG WITH SENATOR FRANK        
20110112040502.000|20110112040504.000|CC1|LAUTENBERG OF NEW JERSEY, THAT  
20110112040504.000|20110112040506.000|CC1|WILL BAN AGAIN, AS THEY USED TO 
20110112040506.000|20110112040511.000|CC1|BE BANNED, A KIND OF EXTENDED   
20110112040511.000|20110112040512.000|CC1|HANDGUN MAGAZINE CLIPS THAT     
20110112040512.000|20110112040513.000|CC1|LOUGHNER USED.                  
20110112040513.000|20110112040514.000|CC1|AND FROM PETER KING OF NEW YORK,
20110112040514.000|20110112040516.000|CC1|THE NEWLY INSTALLED CHAIRMAN OF 
20110112040516.000|20110112040518.000|CC1|SECURITY, A PROPOSAL THAT WOULD 
20110112040518.000|20110112040520.000|CC1|CREATE A ZONE OF SAFETY AT      
20110112040520.000|20110112040521.000|CC1|PUBLIC EVENTS INCLUDING THE     
20110112040521.000|20110112040522.000|CC1|PRESIDENT, VICE PRESIDENT,      
20110112040522.000|20110112040525.000|CC1|LAWMAKERS, AND FEDERAL JUDGES.  
20110112040525.000|20110112040526.000|CC1|THE LAW WOULD MAKE IT ILLEGAL TO
20110112040526.000|20110112040528.000|CC1|BRING A GUN WITHIN 1,000 FEET OF
20110112040528.000|20110112040531.000|CC1|THOSE GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS.     
20110112040531.000|20110112040532.000|CC1|>> RIGHT NOW YOU HAVE SITUATIONS
20110112040532.000|20110112040536.000|CC1|SUCH AS TUCSON, WHERE A PERSON  
20110112040536.000|20110112040538.000|CC1|IS ALLOWED TO CARRY A CONCEALED 
20110112040538.000|20110112040540.000|CC1|WEAPON WITHOUT A PERMIT, AND    
20110112040540.000|20110112040541.000|CC1|AUTHORITIES HAVE NO POWER TO    
20110112040541.000|20110112040541.000|CC1|EVEN PAT THAT PERSON DOWN OR    
20110112040541.000|20110112040543.000|CC1|QUESTION THEM OR WHATEVER.      
20110112040543.000|20110112040544.000|CC1|SO TO ME, IT'S ABSOLUTELY       
20110112040544.000|20110112040546.000|CC1|ESSENTIAL, NOT JUST TO PROTECT  
20110112040546.000|20110112040547.000|CC1|THE INDIVIDUALS INVOLVED, NOT   
20110112040547.000|20110112040549.000|CC1|THAT MEMBERS OF CONGRESS ARE A  
20110112040549.000|20110112040550.000|CC1|SPECIAL CLASS.                  
20110112040550.000|20110112040551.000|CC1|THE FACT IS, THEY DO REPRESENT  
20110112040551.000|20110112040552.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE WHO ELECT THEM.      
20110112040552.000|20110112040553.000|CC1|AND IT'S ESSENTIAL IF WE'RE     
20110112040553.000|20110112040557.000|CC1|GOING TO BE ABLE TO CONTINUE TO 
20110112040557.000|20110112040559.000|CC1|HAVE CONTACT AND TO HAVE        
20110112040559.000|20110112040601.000|CC1|CONVERSATION BETWEEN THE PUBLIC 
20110112040601.000|20110112040602.000|CC1|AND THE ELECTED OFFICIALS, THAT 
20110112040602.000|20110112040604.000|CC1|THE PUBLIC WHO'S AT THESE       
20110112040604.000|20110112040605.000|CC1|MEETINGS CAN BE ASSURED OF THEIR
20110112040605.000|20110112040607.000|CC1|OWN SAFETY.                     
20110112040607.000|20110112040609.000|CC1|AND I ALWAYS BELIEVE IF WE CAN  
20110112040609.000|20110112040611.000|CC1|TAKE A HORRIBLE TRAGEDY AND     
20110112040611.000|20110112040612.000|CC1|ATTEMPT TO GET SOMETHING GOOD   
20110112040612.000|20110112040615.000|CC1|OUT OF IT, THEN ALL IS NOT LOST.
20110112040615.000|20110112040616.000|CC1|>> PART OF THE EFFECT OF        
20110112040616.000|20110112040618.000|CC1|CONGRESSMAN KING'S LEGISLATION  
20110112040618.000|20110112040619.000|CC1|WOULD BE TO OFFSET IN THOSE     
20110112040619.000|20110112040628.000|CC1|SPECIAL CIRCUMSTANCES SOME OF   
20110112040628.000|20110112040630.000|CC1|THE MOST PERMISSIVE GUN LAWS IN 
20110112040630.000|20110112040631.000|CC1|THE COUNTRY, LAWS LIKE THE ONE  
20110112040631.000|20110112040632.000|CC1|PASSED UNDER GOVERNOR BREWER OF 
20110112040632.000|20110112040634.000|CC1|ARIZONA, WHICH EXPANDED THE     
20110112040634.000|20110112040635.000|CC1|CONDITIONS IN WHICH CITIZENS    
20110112040635.000|20110112040638.000|CC1|MIGHT CARRY A CONCEALED WEAPON  
20110112040638.000|20110112040639.000|CC1|IN PUBLIC WITHOUT A PERMIT.     
20110112040639.000|20110112040640.000|CC1|AN ARIZONA STATE SENATOR WANTS  
20110112040640.000|20110112040641.000|CC1|TO FURTHER EXPAND THE CONCEALED 
20110112040641.000|20110112040643.000|CC1|WEAPONS LAW TO THE FACULTY OF   
20110112040643.000|20110112040644.000|CC1|COLLEGE CAMPUSES.               
20110112040644.000|20110112040645.000|CC1|GOVERNOR BREWER TODAY LAID      
20110112040645.000|20110112040647.000|CC1|FLOWERS AT THE MAKESHIFT        
20110112040647.000|20110112040648.000|CC1|MEMORIAL.                       
20110112040648.000|20110112040649.000|CC1|AND THERE ARE THE NATIONAL      
20110112040649.000|20110112040651.000|CC1|LAWMAKERS WHO IN BOTH SUBSTANCE 
20110112040651.000|20110112040653.000|CC1|AND TONE HAVE SUGGESTED A FLAWED
20110112040653.000|20110112040654.000|CC1|RESPONSE TO INTRODUCE STILL MORE
20110112040654.000|20110112040655.000|CC1|GUNS INTO THESE UNPREDICTABLE   
20110112040655.000|20110112040656.000|CC1|PUBLIC EVENTS.                  
20110112040656.000|20110112040658.000|CC1|TWO CONGRESSMEN, DEMOCRAT HEATH 
20110112040658.000|20110112040700.000|CC1|SHULER OF NORTH CAROLINA, AND   
20110112040700.000|20110112040701.000|CC1|JASON CHAFFETZ, THE REPUBLICAN  
20110112040701.000|20110112040702.000|CC1|OF UTAH, SAY THEY PLAN TO CARRY 
20110112040702.000|20110112040704.000|CC1|THEIR OWN GUNS IN THEIR         
20110112040704.000|20110112040705.000|CC1|RESPECTIVE DISTRICTS AS         
20110112040705.000|20110112040706.000|CC1|PROTECTION AGAINST ATTACK.      
20110112040706.000|20110112040708.000|CC1|THAT BROUGHT A SWIFT RESPONSE   
20110112040708.000|20110112040709.000|CC1|FROM THE SERGEANT AT ARMS, WHO  
20110112040709.000|20110112040711.000|CC1|IS ALSO FORMER CHIEF OF CAPITOL
